attributes.action: Remand all child sex offenders and give them longer sentences.
attributes.additional_details: We are Maximum Exposure uk 🇬🇧 And our aim is to protect the children of the uk from online child sex predators who groom children online to meet for sexual pleasure. And we along with the people would like to petition the uk 🇬🇧 government to remand all child sex predators until there trial. And hand out stiffer sentences.
attributes.background:
We the people of the uk would like to see all child sex offenders remanded until trial date.

And we would like to see the courts handing out stiffer prison sentences.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it would be up to the courts to decide whether to put someone on remand.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/271794
